info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 6 at 1:42PM MDT until May 10 at 1:42AM MDT by NWS Pueblo CO
info.description:
...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado...
Arkansas River NEAR Arkansas R near Avondale affecting Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet zone.
Arkansas River Near Arkansas R near Nepesta affecting Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet zone.
Arkansas River At Arkansas R at La Junta affecting La Junta Vicinity/Otero County zone.
Purgatoire River Near Purgatoire R near Las Animas affecting Las Animas Vicinity/Bent County zone.
For the Lower Arkansas River...including Arkansas R near Avondale, Arkansas R near Nepesta, Arkansas R at La Junta...flooding is possible. For the Purgatoire River...including Purgatoire R near Las Animas... flooding is possible.
* WHAT...Flooding is possible.
* WHERE...Purgatoire River near Purgatoire R near Las Animas.
* WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Saturday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Moderate agricultural flooding occurs in low lying areas along the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 2.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding.
Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM MDT.
